clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Camostat mesylate is indicated in Japan to treat chronic pancreatitis and drug induced lung injury A193845 It is also being investigated as a potential treatment for COVID 19 A193800

contraindications.disease: Data regarding overdoses of camostat mesylate are not readily available however common adverse effects include rash pruritus nausea abnormal laboratory test values and diarrhea L13197
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Camostat mesylate is a protease inhibitor used to treat chronic pancreatitis A193845 The duration of action is not long as it is typically given in 3 divided doses daily L13197 Patients should be counselled regarding the risk of anaphylaxis thrombocytopenia hepatic dysfunction and hyperkalemia L13197

incompatibilities.description: Alpha 1 proteinase inhibitor may increase the thrombogenic activities of Camostat
Menadione may increase the thrombogenic activities of Camostat
Tranexamic acid may increase the thrombogenic activities of Camostat
Aminocaproic acid may increase the thrombogenic activities of Camostat
Aprotinin may increase the thrombogenic activities of Camostat
Hydrogen peroxide may increase the thrombogenic activities of Camostat
Aminomethylbenzoic acid may increase the thrombogenic activities of Camostat
The therapeutic efficacy of Fibrinogen human can be increased when used in combination with Camostat
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Tretinoin is combined with Camostat
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Antihemophilic factor human recombinant
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Coagulation factor VIIa Recombinant Human
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Coagulation Factor IX Recombinant
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Calcium acetate
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Calcium chloride
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Calcium
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Pantothenic acid
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Formic acid
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Platelet Activating Factor
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Calcium carbonate
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Turoctocog alfa
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Catridecacog
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Antihemophilic Factor Recombinant PEGylated
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Calcium citrate
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Calcium gluconate
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Calcium threonate
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Prothrombin
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Factor IX Complex Human
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Calcium Phosphate
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Susoctocog alfa
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Eftrenonacog alfa
Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Rusalatide acetate

Camostat may increase the thrombogenic activities of Coagulation factor VII human
